name: Flappy Thakky
description:
Help Thakky fly away from army coup and revolution in Thailand. Help him to free from Jail. Avoid any obstacles, barbed wire, and bunkers, along the way. Help him get democracy he want.

Who get the best score? Share your score in Game Center's Leader board and on Facebook.


Disclaimer: this app does not intent to cause any insult or harm to any bird in the game play.
